citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:34 PM on 06-
August-2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on facility door, calling the phone number on
file and honking horn. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of
the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:34 PM on 06-
August-2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on facility door, calling the phone number on 
file and honking horn. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of 
the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
